name: Hong Cheng 0001
content: Hong Cheng Hong Cheng Professor ¡¡ Department of Systems Engineering and Engineering Management The Chinese University of Hong Kong Room 707, William M. W. Mong Engineering Building The Chinese University of Hong Kong Shatin, N. T., Hong Kong Email: hcheng at se.cuhk.edu.hk Short Biography Hong Cheng is a Professor in Department of Systems Engineering and Engineering Management at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.  She received her Ph.D. in Computer Science from University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 2008. Before that, she received her M.Phil. degree from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in 2003, and B.S. degree from Zhejiang University in 2001. Research Interests: Data mining, machine learning and database systems Publications Honors and Awards Vice-Chancellor's Exemplary Teaching Award 2010, CUHK Exemplary Teaching Award 2010, Faculty of Engineering, CUHK Best Paper Award, 2010 Australasian Database Conference Finalist for SIGKDD Doctoral Dissertation Award, 2009 IBM PhD Scholarship, 2007-2008 Best Student Paper Award, Proc. of 2007 IEEE ICDE Conference Best Student Paper Runner-Up Award, Proc. of 2006 ACM SIGKDD Conference Data Mining Research Silver Award, Data Mining Group at UIUC 2006 Best Student Paper Runner-Up Award, Proc. of 2005 ACM SIGKDD Conference Ministry of Education Fellowship, Ministry of Education, China & HKUST 2001 Patent Structural Data Classification by Hong Cheng, Wei Fan, Xifeng Yan and Philip S. Yu. United States Patent 8121967, Appl. No.: 12/141,251
